title: Arcade Lulu [Concept]
body:
4th day of Skintober prompts! (Arcade)

I am not very good at Yordles, but I wanted to try to incorporate some of the Arcade elements in this skin. I was a more crunched on time as I only took about 1 hour here, but I think there are much more elements that could be incorporated. ೕ(･ㅂ･ )

I aimed for a cute sort of "Player 2" and "Mario" kind of feel

Thanks for looking!

{{champion:117}}

replies.body: I LOVE the shape of Pix for obvious reasons <3 <3 <3
Cute! Although I think Pix would need some HEY LISTEN voice over :P
Well, Pix's debuff on enemies is already called "HEY, LISTEN!"

I think they would have to go so far as to make "HEY LISTEN" the taunt or joke. So you could just spam it. "HEY LISTEN. HEY LISTEN. HEY LISTEN. HEY-HEY-HEY-HEY-H-H-H-H-H-H-H-HEY-HEY LISTEN" Im sure some people would smash that mute button.
Haha, that would be quite wonderful~
This is a nice concept c:

My boyfriend and I were talking about this concept last night on the drive home and unanimously agreed Pix should be inspired by the fairy from Legend of Zelda while also being renamed to Pixel. Lovely concept and super impressed that you managed to do it in only 1 hour! :D
It's meant to be! Haha, thank you (๑´ω`๑)
